## 0.1.8 (2014-01-31)

* Added support for release types, to auto increment by

## 0.1.5 (2014-01-27)
* Release prompt now has the current package version as the default

* Made grunt commands async

## 0.1.3 (2014-01-27)
* Added grunt as a dependency

## 0.1.2 (2014-01-27)
* Added test task for Travis CI
* Fixed CLI add

## 0.1.1 (2014-01-27)
